org.apache.oodt.cas.resource.jobqueue

Class FifoMappedJobQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.oodt.cas.resource.jobqueue.FifoMappedJobQueue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobQueue, MappedJobQueue

    public class FifoMappedJobQueue
extends Object
implements MappedJobQueue
    This implementation provides a "queue-aware" JobQueue that ensures the FIFO execution of jobs.
    Author:
    resneck

      • getCapacity

        public int getCapacity()
        This method returns the number of jobs in any given queue that can be retained in the queue. This number does not change with the number of queues in the ResourceManager.
        Specified by:
        getCapacity in interface JobQueue
        Returns:
        The number of jobs of each queue that can be queued.
